name: Lone Pirate VR
description: It's not easy being a pirate... especially without a crew. Well atleast all of the booty will be yours. Sail the sea, sink some ships, plunder some gold and get the highest score you can!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 / AMD Radeon™ R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 150 MB available space
